scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a divine figure, likely God the Father, seated on blue clouds, holding a cross atop a globe. He is robed in red and gold, with a halo. Before him kneels a woman, dressed in an orange patterned gown and a purple mantle, her hands clasped in prayer. To the right, an angel with green wings, wearing white, hovers and presents a crown to the kneeling woman. The background is a golden expanse, suggesting a celestial or spiritual realm, with architectural elements framing the upper part of the scene, including an arch and decorative motifs.
